intro: Aira media, commonly known as smooth air黍, is a flowering plant native to temperate regions of Asia and North America. It belongs to the grass family (Poaceae) and is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, spike-like inflorescences. The plant produces delicate blue or purple flowers that bloom in late summer, followed by small, oval-shaped seeds. It is often found in open fields, meadows, and along roadsides, thriving in well-drained soils. Due to its ornamental value and ecological benefits, it is sometimes cultivated in gardens and used in restoration projects.
